page.title: 09A JUNIOR'S DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: We come into school at 9 o'clock and after register we go to the hall for assembly.Then we go back to our classes to work.We do lots of different things,maths,writing stories or about activities,project work that sometimes we can choose.We do alot of art,on Thursdays we have swimming and woodwork,on Tuesdays we have games,on Fridays we do P.E.At 12 we have our lunch.There are alot of things to do at our school.There is the choir and orchestra,gym club,chess club,cricket rounders,football,netball,and hockey matches.There is also badminton and table tennis. After lunch we do some more work,like reading,finishing stories or patterns.We don't have a break in the afternoon any more,we start to clear away at 3.15 and the bell goes at 3.20.
